name: gixplcli
description: Simple PatternLab pattern creator from a command line you run at the root of your pattern package

scripts.test:
node gixplcli.js -n atoms-mytext -t mytitle -d "My description" --goal "My goal for the pattern to achieve" --actions "my first action
mysecond action" --id 90e09d47a1dc4edf8f373b05a2c10c87
scripts.testinnerhtml:
node gixplcli.js -n atoms-mytext-0f2ef2b7d861473d933020230c770471 -t mytitle -d "My description if a pattern" --goal "My goal for the pattern to achieve" --actions "my first action mysecond action" --innerhtml "

{{title}}

specified html

"

author: J. Guillaume Isabelle
